snippet: In videos posted online, some customers said they heard a curse when, by tapping one of the tiny plastic toys against a hard surface, they activated its voice.
abstract: McDonald's responds to complaints that its new Happy Meal toys based on animated film Minions make noises that sound like curse words, insisting that sounds are not meant to be profane or offensive.
lead_paragraph: In videos posted online, some customers said they heard a curse when, by tapping one of the tiny plastic toys against a hard surface, they activated its voice.

headline.main: McDonald’s Denies That Happy Meal Toy Curses
headline.print_headline: Mcdonald’s Denies That Happy Meal Toy Curses
